author: Sophia Harris
title: Canadian passengers on virus-stricken Coral Princess cruise ship worry how they'll get home
description: Canadian passengers on the Coral Princess cruise ship nearing Fort Lauderdale, Fla., worry how they’ll get home after at least a dozen COVID-19 cases have been diagnosed on board.
content:
Canadian passengers on the Coral Princess cruise ship nearing Fort Lauderdale, Fla., worry how they'll get home after at least a dozen COVID-19 cases have been diagnosed on board.
Their fears are stoked by the recent experience of the Zaandam, a Holland Amer… [+4775 chars]
